sentences.sContent: Describe project deliverables in the vaguest possible terms so sponsors and reviewers have plenty of leeway to reinvent the project outputs repeatedly as the project unfolds.
sentences.sContent_eng: Describe project deliverables in the vaguest possible terms so sponsors and reviewers have plenty of leeway to reinvent the project outputs repeatedly as the project unfolds.
sentences.sCn: 用尽可能模糊的语言描述项目可交付成果，让发起人及审核者随着项目的开展，能有足够的空间不断地重新定义项目成果。
